title.rendered: Air Guilin Airlines in Guilin City, Guangxi

content.rendered:
Air Guilin is a Chinese airline with its headquarters in Xiufeng District, Guilin, Guangxi, and with Guilin Liangjiang International Airport as its main base of flight operations. A joint venture between the Guilin Municipal Government and HNA Group, the airline began operations in June 2016 using Airbus A319 aircraft. It intends to boost the tourism industry in Guilin.

 

Air Guilin Airlines Address :  No. 32, Sanduo Road, Xiufeng District, Guilin City, Guangxi
Post Code: 541001

Phone number :
Customer service telephone 9501101

First, the official service hotline
24-hour booking, inquiry, service hotline: 9501101

Complaint Email: glhkcxgw@hnair.com

Second, aircraft media cooperation
Aircraft Media Cooperation Telphone: +86 07732844649

Aircraft media cooperation email: glhkrzxzbppglzx@hnair.com

Third, company information
Zip code: 541001

For feedback/complaints: https://fltnet.hnair.net/crew/pub/complaint/cgh.do?locale=zh_CN

Air Guilin Airlines Official website : https://www.airguilin.com/

Official Wechat: airguilin

Fleet size: 11

  • Airbus A319-100
  • Airbus A320-200

Air Guilin Airlines Baggage Allowance

Air Guilin Airlines Baggage

View Air Guilin Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Traveling while Pregnant woman in Air Guilin Airlines

  • Healthy pregnant women who have more than 8 months (32 weeks) (inclusive) but less than 9 months (36 weeks) must take the county and city within 24 hours before boarding the flight if there are special circumstances that require boarding.
  • The “Diagnosis Certificate” of the grade or equivalent of the medical unit stamped at the above grade (such as the national dimethyl level) and the signature of the doctor shall be in triplicate, and it shall be noted that it shall be valid before XX.

Queries handled by Air Guilin Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Guilin Airlines Guilin City, Guangxi Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Guilin Airlines Guilin City, Guangxi: (click on the stars below)
